weather.precipitation: Summer in Innsbruck is generally warm and mild with occasional showers.
weather.what_to_pack: Pack light clothing, sunscreen, a hat, and a light jacket for cool evenings.

tourism.costs: Prices may be slightly lower than peak season
tourism.booking_advice: Book accommodations and attractions in advance to secure preferred options.

highlights.name: Innsbruck Festival of Early Music
highlights.description: A renowned music festival featuring classical performances in historic venues.
highlights.tips: Arrive early to enjoy the ambiance and secure good seats.

highlights.name: Nordkette Mountain Range
highlights.description: Spectacular alpine views and outdoor activities like hiking and mountain biking.
highlights.tips: Wear sturdy shoes and carry water for hikes.

highlights.name: Ambras Castle
highlights.description: Explore a Renaissance castle with impressive art collections and gardens.
highlights.tips: Join a guided tour for in-depth insights.

highlights.name: Alpine Zoo
highlights.description: Visit Europe's highest zoo with a focus on alpine wildlife.
highlights.tips: Check feeding times for animal encounters.

highlights.name: Golden Roof
highlights.description: Iconic landmark with a golden roof and historical significance.
highlights.tips: Best viewed during sunset for golden hues.

highlights.name: Swarovski Crystal Worlds
highlights.description: Experience a dazzling world of crystal art and innovation.
highlights.tips: Plan for at least half a day to explore the exhibitions.

recommended_activities.practical_tips: Rent a bike in Innsbruck and carry water and snacks.
